{"id":491687619,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1620725625,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/491687619/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Operations to Make Array Equal","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minOperations(int n) {\n        int arr[n];\n        int sum=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n            arr[i]=2*i+1;\n            sum+=arr[i];\n        }\n        sum/=n;\n        int ans=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n            ans+=abs(arr[i]-sum);\n        }\n        return ans/2;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-operations-to-make-array-equal"}
